actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE Invalid_Scaling SET
		Location = '{{invalid_scaling_update.fieldState.Location.isVisible ? invalid_scaling_update.formData.Location : invalid_scaling_update.sourceData.Location}}',
		Docket = '{{invalid_scaling_update.fieldState.Docket.isVisible ? invalid_scaling_update.formData.Docket : invalid_scaling_update.sourceData.Docket}}',
    Grade = '{{invalid_scaling_update.fieldState.Grade.isVisible ? invalid_scaling_update.formData.Grade : invalid_scaling_update.sourceData.Grade}}',
		Length = '{{invalid_scaling_update.fieldState.Length.isVisible ? invalid_scaling_update.formData.Length : invalid_scaling_update.sourceData.Length}}',
		Diameter = '{{invalid_scaling_update.fieldState.Diameter.isVisible ? invalid_scaling_update.formData.Diameter : invalid_scaling_update.sourceData.Diameter}}',
		JAS = '{{invalid_scaling_update.fieldState.JAS.isVisible ? invalid_scaling_update.formData.JAS : invalid_scaling_update.sourceData.JAS}}',
		Date = '{{invalid_scaling_update.fieldState.Date.isVisible ? invalid_scaling_update.formData.Date : invalid_scaling_update.sourceData.Date}}',
		Reason = '{{invalid_scaling_update.fieldState.Reason.isVisible ? invalid_scaling_update.formData.Reason : invalid_scaling_update.sourceData.Reason}}'
WHERE Log = {{invalid_table.selectedRow.Log}};
